comment: Priced right, but not as smooth as Clan McGregors, my go to. Initial taste is sweet and smooth, but has an after taste that takes away from it. Does go down smooth.
It's a $10 bottle of Scotch and it tastes like it. If you don't mind $10 Scotch, it's fine.

Lauder's Blended Scotch 🤷‍♂️
Sight 🧐 ; Light straw-coloured,
Nose 👃; Caramel and malt sweetness, slight fruit at the end,
Taste 👅 ; Light spice and smoke, caramel, slight dryness, 
Finish 🇫🇮 ; Smooth, medium length with some more fruits, mostly apricots and apples,

6 / 10 🥃

A little to light and smooth for my palate, even tho it's nicely balanced I'd like some thing that excites me some more.
Very light bodied with a fruity after taste
Put a little water in it, and you sip a nice Scotch for what it is.
